title: Find LCD
text: The least common denominator of $$\frac{72}{156}$$ and $$\frac{-6}{q}$$ is 156q.

title: Multiply LCD Both Sides
text: Through multiplying both sides by LCD, we get $$72q=-6\times156$$.

title: Isolate q on One side
text: We can divide by 72 on both sides and get $$q=-13$$ as the final answer.
